about_the_game:
Can you imagine staking your very soul just to find love? It's a proposition that most people would find unthinkable. However, our dear friend Michi, driven by sheer desperation, found himself making a fateful decision. In a moment of weakness, he struck a deal with a cunning demon, offering his soul in exchange for the fulfillment of his deepest desires. But as the saying goes, "beware the Devil's bargain." Michi now faces the daunting task of finding a girlfriend within a mere 30 days. Failure to do so will condemn him to an eternity of servitude in the underworld, at the mercy of the demon. Join us in the first chapter of this series as we unravel the events that led Michi down this treacherous path.

Content Warning - This VN Contains the Following:
Partial nudity of characters, characters in sexual situations, characters in sexual poses, references to the demonic world, dark humor and/or conversations, moderate swearing, and dad jokes. Viewer discretion is advised when purchasing this visual novel.

short_description: Experience the impact of making a pact with a demon in this linear visual novel, where the consequences can be life-changing in an instant. Michi, the main character, has the chance to pursue a romantic relationship with any of the female characters, including the demon he made a deal with.
